comment: Absolutely love these headphones! The noise cancellation is top-notch and the sound quality is crystal clear.
Great value for the price. Battery lasts long, but the ear cups get uncomfortable after a while.
Decent for casual listening, but not quite up to par for audiophiles.
Noise cancellation barely works in my office. Expected better performance.
Exceeded my expectations! Lightweight, amazing sound, and reliable Bluetooth connection.
